articles.title: Lowell police seeking public’s help with details about fatal hit-and-run
articles.description:
Police have identified the vehicle involved in the incident, but are still calling upon the public to share any further details.

The post Lowell police seeking public’s help with details about fatal hit-and-run appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: ‘This is just the beginning’: Nonbinding Israel divestment ballot question passes in Somerville
articles.description:
Question 3 asks voters whether Somerville officials should divest from companies that “engage in business that sustains Israel’s apartheid, genocide and illegal occupation of Palestine."

The post ‘This is just the beginning’: Nonbinding Israel divestment ballot question passes in Somerville  appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Tom Brady just revealed that his dog Junie is a clone of Lua, his deceased furry friend
articles.description:
Brady said he partnered with a biotech company that he invested in to collect a blood sample from his old dog and clone her.

The post Tom Brady just revealed that his dog Junie is a clone of Lua, his deceased furry friend appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Running unopposed, Michelle Wu secures second term as her national profile grows
articles.description:

articles.title: Tell us: What should Mayor Wu focus on in her second term?
articles.description:

articles.title: ‘This is kidnapping — plain and simple’: ICE arrests 9 employees at Allston car wash
articles.description:

articles.title: Amid SNAP benefit cuts, these Greater Boston food businesses are here to help
articles.description:

articles.title: Karen Read shuffles defense attorney lineup in wrongful death suit
articles.description:
